title: A Collection of interactive work created by students (MAC)
creator_contributor_role: Department of Visual Communication, RMIT, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
description: Episode of Series "RMIT Collection". Interactive works of the Graduate Diploma Students of Animation and Interactive Media at RMIT. The titles included are: 'Haiku Dada' - Felix Hude; 'Arlecchino' - Rosanna Morales; 'Autograph' - Mark Lycette; 'Totally Rediculuos' - Greg Zaritski; 'Travels with cod' - Gwyn Wethereld; 'The Swear Club' - Michael Buckley; 'Equinox' - Paul Western-Pittard.
